upgradeSet(uint32,uint32).details: Pass 0 to skip updating either revision

registerSet(bytes32).notice: Registers the set represented by the calling contract

touchSet().notice: Increments the revision of the set represented by the calling contract

updateSet(bytes32).notice: Updates the content hash for the set represented by the calling contract

upgradeSet(uint32,uint32).notice: Upgrades the kind or set revision of the set represented by the calling contract
